mapper.insert: insert into doctor (d_id, d_headPic, d_name, d_duty, d_adept, d_intro, d_number, d_good, d_fans, d_consult, d_subscribe, d_weibo, d_attestation, d_addTime,d_good_num) values (#{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dHeadpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dAdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dGood,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dFans,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dConsult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dSubscribe,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dWeibo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dAttestation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{dGoodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update doctor set d_headPic = #{dHeadpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_name = #{dName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_duty = #{dDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_adept = #{dAdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_intro = #{dIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_number = #{dNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_good = #{dGood,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_fans = #{dFans,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_consult = #{dConsult,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_subscribe = #{dSubscribe,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_weibo = #{dWeibo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_attestation = #{dAttestation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_addTime = #{dAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, d_good_num=#{dGoodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where d_id = #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select d_id, d_headPic, d_name, d_duty, d_adept, d_intro, d_number, d_good, d_fans, d_consult, d_subscribe, d_weibo, d_attestation, d_addTime,d_good_num from doctor where d_id = #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select d_id, d_headPic, d_name, d_intro,d_good_num from doctor
select d_id, d_headPic, d_name, d_duty, d_adept, d_intro, d_number, d_good, d_fans, d_consult, d_subscribe, d_weibo, d_attestation, d_addTime,d_good_num from doctor
